# File lib/openid/trustroot.rb, line 151
      def TrustRoot._build_path(path, query=nil, frag=nil)
        s = path.dup

        frag = nil if frag == ''
        query = nil if query == ''

        if query
          s << "?" << query
        end

        if frag
          s << "#" << frag
        end

        return s
      end
